thread.title: ReginaH
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by ReginaH

author: ReginaH
title: ReginaH
text: Recently I ordered a print from a artist, and found when it arrived that it was a couple of inches off from any conventional sizing. I was able to order a perfectly fit custom sized mat from Matboard and More so that I could let this print shine as the artist intended and still put it in the conventionally sized frame that I had already purchased for the print. The way the mat was packaged for shipping was great as well, it arrived in pristine condition. I wouldn't hesitate to order from them again!
